name: CrashPolice
description:
a game personnaly made in unity in 3 weeks. One player play a police car chasing a racing thieves, the other need to take checkpoint to win !

Play only in 1024 x 768 and multiplayer (only one controller is used, sorry)

music : tribute to the kings by trafic de Blues

https://www.jamendo.com/track/12303/tribute-to-the-kings
